ValidationRule.description: Prevents a meeting that has been rescheduled to be set back to scheduled
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.DeveloperName <> 'BOFE_Hearing' && ISCHANGED ( Status__c ) && ISPICKVAL ( Status__c, 'Scheduled' ) && ISPICKVAL ( PRIORVALUE ( Status__c) , 'Rescheduled' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A meeting that has been rescheduled cannot be set back to Scheduled status.
